XRLightEstimatePrimaryLightIntensity.summary: The read-only primaryLightIntensity property of the interface returns a representing the intensity of the primary light source from the probeSpace of an .
XRLightEstimatePrimaryLightIntensity.value: A object where an RGB value is mapped to the x, y, and z values. The w value is always 1.0. If no estimated values from the user's environment are available, the point will be {x: 0.0, y: 0.0, z: 0.0, w: 1.0}, representing no illumination.
